Global Options for GGPubr

Source: R/ggpubr_options.R
ggpubr_options.Rd

Displays allowed global options in ggpubr.

ggpubr_options()

Examples


ggpubr_options()
#> $ggpubr.parse_aes
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $ggpubr.null_device
#> function (width, height) 
#> {
#>     grDevices::pdf(NULL, width = width, height = height)
#>     grDevices::dev.control("enable")
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x55556484c0a8>
#> <environment: namespace:cowplot>
#>
